original_text: Do not eat it, so that it may go well with you and your children after you, because you will be doing what is right in the eyes of the Lord.
korean_text: 너는 피를 먹지 말라 네가 이같이 여호와께서 의롭게 여기시는 일을 행하면 너와 네 후손이 복을 누리리라

sentences.original_text: so that it may go well with you
because you will be doing what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 옳은 일을 행하게 될 것이기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: in the eyes of the Lord
